original: Forsmark, Karl Alf, kyrkoherde, Kärda, f. 5/10/01 i Gränna landsförs. av kantorn o. folksk :lär. Axel F. o. Hanna Andersson. G. 30 m. Ruth Carling. Barn: Ingegerd f. 31, Carl-Olof 32, Elisabet 35, Ragnhild 43. — Stud:ex. i Jönköp. 22, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 24, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 29. Tjg. s. past:adj. i Borgholm, v. kommin. i Månsarp samt v. pastor i Barnarp, jämte egen tj. v. kommin. i Vetlanda, kommin. i Skede 29, kyrkoh. i Kärda sed. 36. Omb. f. stiftsrådet i Östbo kontr.. Sv. kyrkans miss:styr. omb. i Östbo kontr., v. ordf. o. kassör i Finnveds-krets. av ASP, ordf. i kyrkoråd, past :kyrkoråd, kyrkostämma, past:-stämma o. folksk :styr., led. av kom-m:fullm.
translated: Forsmark, Karl Alf, vicar, Kärda, born 5/10/01 in Gränna, son of the cantor and the primary school teacher Axel F. and Hanna Andersson. Married to Ruth Carling in 1930 and they have four children: Ingegerd born in 1931, Carl-Olof born in 1932, Elisabet born in 1935, and Ragnhild born in 1943. Forsmark graduated from high school in Jönköping in 1922, earned a degree in theology from Lund University in 1924, passed practical theology test, and was ordained as a priest for the Växjö diocese in 1929. He worked as an assistant pastor in Borgholm, a deputy minister in Månsarp and Barnarp, and a deputy minister in Vetlanda, before he became a vicar in Skede in 1929 and later in Kärda in 1936. Forsmark served as a representative for the diocese council in Östbo and the Swedish Church's Missionary Board in Östbo, as well as the chairman and treasurer of the Finnveds district of the ASP. He was also a member of the church council, the pastorate church council, the church assembly, the pastorate assembly, and the primary school board and was a member of the municipal council.

education.name: Teol. kand
education.description: Ordained as a priest for the Växjö diocese
